configobject for configuring the component.

Variables

config

var config

object for configuring the component.

{string} base url baseUrl

{string} http proxy url proxyUrl

{number} start param for the first page load start

{number} limit param for the first page load limit

{number} msmTimeout param for set ajax request timeout msmTimeout

Examples of urls

map composer http://localhost:8080/mapcomposer/ user details (used in login) http://localhost:8080/geostore/rest/users/user/details/ resource (i.e. maps) search http://localhost:8080/geostore/rest/extjs/search/ resource rest endpoint http://localhost:8080/geostore/rest/resources user rest endpoint http://localhost:8080/geostore/rest/users
